name: Fried Asparagus
description: Fresh asparagus lightly battered and quick-fried. Topped with crumbled queso fresco, chopped cilantro & a drizzle of chimichurri sauce. Served with roasted garlic aioli.

name: Loaded Boneless Wings
description: Boneless wings smothered in white queso, 3-cheese blend, applewood smoked bacon & chopped green onions. Served with a side of house-made ranch.

name: White Spinach Queso
description: White queso & chopped spinach topped with shredded Monterey Jack cheese, house-made pico de gallo, fresh guacamole, queso fresco & chopped cilantro. Served with warm tostada chips & fresh salsa.

name: Crispy Cheddar Bites
description: Lightly battered & golden fried white & yellow Wisconsin cheese curds topped with a sprinkle of Cajun spice and chopped cilantro. Served with house-made ancho-chile ranch.

name: House Salad
description: Freshly diced tomatoes, red onion, shredded carrots, cucumbers, 3-cheese blend & garlic croutons. Served with your choice of dressing.

name: Santa Fe Chicken Salad
description: Grilled chile-seasoned chicken, house-made pico de gallo, diced avocado, chopped cilantro, tortilla strips with house-made ranch & a drizzle of spicy Santa Fe sauce.

name: Chicken Enchilada Soup
description: Topped with crispy tortilla strips & 3-cheese blend.

name: Terlingua Chili
description: Slow-cooked chili with beef, onions & chiles. Topped with cheese.

name: Sweet & Smoky Burger
description: Topped with melted pepper Jack cheese, applewood smoked bacon,spiced panko onion rings, fresh leaf lettuce, tomato,mango-infused BBQ sauce & Chili's Signature sauce. Served with a side of mango-infused BBQ sauce.

name: Guacamole Burger
description: Topped with fresh guacamole, melted Monterey Jack cheese, fire-roasted jalapeños, sauteed red & green bell peppers, caramelized onions & cumin-lime sour cream.

name: Classic Bacon Burger
description: Topped with applewood smoked bacon, melted sharp cheddar cheese, house-made garlic dill pickles, fresh leaf lettuce, tomato, sliced red onions & Chili's Signature sauce.

name: Oldtimer® with Cheese
description: A Chili's classic - improved! Hand seasoned beef patty, seared to perfection. Topped with house-made garlic dill pickles, fresh leaf lettuce, tomato, sliced red onions & mustard.

name: Triple Berry Crumble Cake
description: Warm blackberries & blueberries baked with rich buttercake topped with streusel and finished with vanilla ice cream, strawberry sauce & cinnamon-sugar.

name: Skillet Toffee Fudge Brownie
description: Oven-baked toffee brownie topped with vanilla ice cream, drizzled with caramel sauce & topped with toffee pieces. († This dish contains nuts)

name: Skillet Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: Oven-baked chocolate chip cookie topped with vanilla ice cream & drizzled with hot fudge.

name: Cheesecake
description: A rich New York-style cheesecake with graham cracker crust. Served over strawberry puree.
